name: Spell Panic!
description:
Developed in 2017 by a team of students at ACC, Spell Panic was a collaboration between the Game Development, Game Art, Game Animation, and Music Production teams. It's a first person tower defense game, where you, a Sorcerer, must defend yourself against wave after wave of monsters!

The game features a wave mode, as well as a survival mode!

Developers

Noah King - https://dreamchasers.itch.io/

Sean Murphy
